li.label: aphrodisiac fruit withdrawal
li.description: I feel restless, pained, hungry and frustrated. My body craves the stimulation of the strange fruit.

li.label: Mild warmth
li.description: I feel a pleasant warmth spreading through my body. Everything seems a bit more... interesting.

li.label: Obfuscated mind
li.description: My thoughts are getting hazy, but in an oddly pleasant way. I can't stop thinking about... certain things.

li.label: Lack of control
li.description: I'm finding it hard to focus on anything but my desires. I feel like I'm on fire!

li.label: Obsession
li.description: I can't think straight anymore, desires are overwhelming! I HAVE to satisfy!

li.label: Craze
li.description: It is flooding my mind, the urge to obey the will of the fruit. MUST... Do... It...

li.label: Insanity
li.description: It consumes me, overtakes me... The chaotic whirlpool of desire, drowning everything in uncontrollable lust...
